opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Joseph S. Hopper, Warden v. James Andrew Johnson A/K/A Jerry Leon Brooks

opinion:
454 U.S. 1010

102 S.Ct. 548

70 L.Ed.2d 412

Joseph S. HOPPER, Warden, Petitioner
v.
James Andrew JOHNSON a/k/a Jerry Leon Brooks

No. 81-60

Supreme Court of the United States

November 2, 1981

1

The motion of respondent for leave to proceed in forma pauperis is granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit denied.
